column4: The Phnom Penh Municipal Police Departmentâ€™s official Facebook page posted on October 11
column7: police will take measures to  detain cars and motorcycles on the road without a license plate. Non-plated vehicles will be fined and held with traffic police until plates are prepared and added.------The announcement comes after vehicles without numbers were used to commit crimes such as burglary or robbery.------The Phnom Penh Municipal Police Commissioner is hopeful that citizens will cooperate with law enforcement. ------KBN
